original_text: So when David was with them, he pretended to be crazy. He made marks with his fingers on the doors of the city's gate. He let water run out of his mouth and go down his beard.
korean_text: 그들 앞에서 그의 행동을 변하여 미친 체하고 대문짝에 그적거리며 침을 수염에 흘리매

sentences.original_text: So when David was with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다윗이 그들과 함께 있을 때

sentences.original_text: He made marks with his fingers
on the doors of the city's gate
He let water run out of his mouth

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 수염을 타고 내려가게 했습니다
